channel.title: Can We Pk?
channel.description:
[size=24pt]Come pk on the easiest going server around![/size]
All items and stats are yours to take! use ::Setstat to change your stats anytime you want! all items are provided for free in the shop
Bring your friends find out who is the king!
Kill everyone you can then show off your skillz
Join us and relive Pking the way you want it!
Forums:.:.:.:.: [url=http://www.canwepk.no-ip.info]Can We Pk?[/url]
Client Download:.:.:.:.: [url=http://www.canwepk.no-ip.info/download/Can-We-Pk-Client-5.4.rar]Multiupload[/url]

X Smokethis:

@ the server:
there has been similar servers and none of them has lasted long, but good luck anyway. Maybe I give it a try if theres anybody playing

item.title: Can We Pk?
item.dc:creator: @masterpowers masterpowers
item.description:
@masterpowers wrote:

people bitch and complain a awful lot about a server for bullshitting on. This server is not ment to be big in any way but for people to pk with friends or random people or hell even to test stats for another server. I figured it would be nice to have to play, eventually i’ll write up some events ect. to do on it but until then everyone can pretty well kiss my ass play it or not lol don’t bother coming on the thread to rage because that helps no one’s argument considering the facts of this server. have a great day!!

Read full topic
